description: This file defines the NoteEditorActivity class, which manages the user interface for adding or editing notes in a notes app. It handles UI initialization, data retrieval, saving, and deleting notes, including user interaction and lifecycle management.

classes.name: NoteEditorActivity
classes.description: An Android activity for creating or editing a note, handling UI interactions, and persisting changes via the NotesRepository.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components and loads existing note data if editing.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the options menu and configures visibility of delete option based on context.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selections for saving, deleting, or navigating back.

methods.name: saveNote
methods.description: Saves the current note (new or existing) asynchronously.

methods.name: handleBack
methods.description: Handles back navigation with a confirmation dialog if there are unsaved changes.

methods.name: onBackPressed
methods.description: Overrides default back button behavior to include custom handling.

methods.name: onDestroy
methods.description: Cancels ongoing coroutines when activity is destroyed.
